abstract: Cisco Systems announced a $100 million agreement on Thursday to buy venture-backed Securent. The three-year-old company makes security software that helps companies manage different tiers of application users.
lead_paragraph: Cisco Systems announced a $100 million agreement on Thursday to buy venture-backed Securent. The three-year-old company makes security software that helps companies manage different tiers of application users.

headline.main: Cisco Secures a Deal for Securent
